verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Muhiki na muhikania menyai
kuma umuthi mwatuika kiiga
kimwe gitangiteithuranwo. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Naguo wendani uyu
nama ti wendani wa itheru
na ti wa kwiricukwo
naguo wendani uyu
nama muuige ngiya ikuuiro
mutigacambicure.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nimwakigwatithanio
na munyoro munyiitu
gikaragei muri eeri
mutikanericukwo.x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mutikanahurujanio ni
miago itaari njira na thiritu
ya andu aria
matehokete Ngai.x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na mathiina manyu mothe
tegagirai Ngai
na riria mugukena
kenai thiini wa Kristu.x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ngai aromurathimaga
araathime ciana cianyu
na arugamiiriri anyu
na aria magomanite.x2
